summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SystemStatusPanel implementation - unified panel successfully replaces multiple duplicate components with three-column layout

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 server error for different horizons (7d, 14d, 30d, 60d, 90d, 180d)
critical_bugs.impact: Prevents Projection Context and Data Status columns from getting complete data

working_endpoints.status: Working correctly - returns phaseSnapshot for Market State column
Working correctly - returns consensus summary for Market State column

passed_tests: SystemStatusPanel displays with three columns (Market State, Projection Context, Data Status)
Market State shows Phase (Accumulation), Consensus (50), Sync State (Neutral), Structure Weight (50%), Divergence (C)
Projection Context shows Focus (30D), Window (60d), Aftermath (30d), Matches (0), Sample (0), Coverage (â€”), Quality (0%)
Data Status shows FALLBACK badge and matches count (appropriate during backend issues)
Chart Mode Switcher works correctly with Price/Replay/Hybrid modes
All interactive elements are clickable and responsive
Horizon selection buttons work correctly with visual state changes
Chart mode switching works correctly with visual state changes
success_percentage: Backend: 31% (4/13 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (19/20 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix /api/fractal/v2.1/focus-pack endpoint returning 520 errors to enable complete data population in Projection Context and Data Status columns
